Detailed Description

State variables for the BLE module.

◆ bLastPacketWasTX

bool am_hal_ble_state_t::bLastPacketWasTX

Was our last operation to send a TX packet? If we have two TX packets in a row, we need special handling to get the timing right.

◆ sSavedTransfer

am_hal_ble_transfer_t am_hal_ble_state_t::sSavedTransfer

If a write is interrupted by a read, we have to save the write transaction to execute later. That saved write goes here.
